name: One Finger Dungeon
description:
Welcome to One Finger Dungeon! Follow the furious adventure of Bjorn while he's in search of..... a horn full of mead?!? Anyway! Give him a hand, or rather a finger, to stomp every puny goblin in his path and quench his thirst! Use your power to hold back Bjorn! He's way too dumb and stubborn to understand the concept of danger! 

- A Dungeon Running Game you can play with just ONE finger. 

- Intuitive controls: Hold to stop and block , release to run and slay your foes. 

 -Run through the dungeon and dodge traps

 -Stomp every little goblin in your way

 -DO. NOT. DIE.

And bang head to the original soundtrack from Alex Carli

Updates:

Version 1.1 After release Patch: Fixed a bug that was teleporting the player into the void after level 3.
